Package openmdao.units
----------------------




This package is based on the PhysicalQuantity package that is part of ScientificPython.
It performs unit conversions.


.. index:: units.py

.. _openmdao.units.units.py:

units.py
++++++++

.. automodule:: openmdao.units.units
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
